sub_fields.label: Button Link External
sub_fields.name: button_link_external
sub_fields.instructions: From YouTube or any 3rd party website.

sub_fields.label: Hero Video (External)
sub_fields.name: hero_video_external
sub_fields.instructions: YouTube Video ID. For example, the full YouTube link is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0UnqGm_miA the YouTube Video ID is D0UnqGm_miA

sub_fields.label: YouTube Video ID
sub_fields.name: youtube_video_id
sub_fields.instructions: YouTube Video ID. For example, the full YouTube link is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0UnqGm_miA the YouTube Video ID is D0UnqGm_miA

sub_fields.label: Column Data
sub_fields.name: column_data
sub_fields.instructions: Can add more than 3 fields, but only 3 will show
